评论详情: Bought them for a throw back party but wear them all the time!!! Takes me back to my childhood days!!! I love the weight of them they aren’t too heavy but they are too light just right and the color doesn’t or hasn’t faded or changed the words haven’t bent or fallen off!!! These are pretty sturdy!!! 10 outta 10 I recommend

Purchased these for a costume party and they worked great with my outfit! The only problem was that when opening the clasp they were stuck in the loop. I was worried about breaking them when trying to open the loop but they opened and worked just fine! They didn’t feel heavy, the color was solid, and the size hoop was exactly what I was looking for

These earrings were perfect for a 90s themed art showcase I attended as a rug vendor. These earrings complimented my outfit so well. I got so many compliments on them. Though they are larger earrings they are lightweight and comfortable to wear. They did not tug on my earlobes. Though it is not real gold, they are decent quality. I only wore them for one night so I did not have an issue with tarnishing or turning my earlobes. If you need a quick accessory to complete a 90s themed outfit these are great value for your money.

Very comfortable and cute to wear! Not too heavy, may last you longer if you apply a thin coat of clear nail polish, not too large but big enough to be seen, you can avoid tarnishing by applying clear nail polish to it as well as using them only if necessary.
A little heavy.
I expected these to be heavy but the clasp doesn't hold the earring closed at all. Constantly falling off even after trying to play with it with pliers.
Perfect earrings. Bought to complete my outfit to a 90's-2000's concert so was perfect for that! They are high quality and not too heavy. Got many compliments. So cute!!
Cute if they are what your looking for, I don’t like bigger hoops.
They were broke before I even opened the package
I haven’t worn them that many times or that long and the clasp in the back has broken. If you’re gonna make heavy earrings the first step is to make sure they stay on.

My wife ordered the Fashion Retro Baby Word Hoop Earrings for a theme party, and they worked perfectly. They were stylish and comfortable to wear all night. Highly recommend for anyone looking for fun, retro accessories.
So dope, wore these with my salt and pepa costume for Halloween. I'm a thicker girl, so the fact that they say chunky is hilarious to me. Very cute, very around the way girl.
Earrings came broke . Babygirl was broken off of them before I even opened the package. Now I have to wear broken earrings to my party tonight

But she loves the way they look. Good packaging, came as described.

They are very thick/sturdy. I loved the quality of them.

Got these earrings for a 90s party .. they were exactly what I wanted.. they looked very authentic and bright back great memories of the bamboo Era.. what I liked most was the earrings are very very light.. no pulling on the earlobs.. only con of there's earring is the earrings had a bar that you for through your piercing,  be careful not to break the earring bar,  it's very thin, very fragile and popping out open for the first time can be tough..Also bought this wig here on Amazon to complete my 90s look

Cute but came with the word CHICANA broken off. They come in a tiny bag. Pretty heavy can't wear all day. It would be better if they came in a box or something. You risk getting them delivered broken since their just in a little bag. I asked for a pair to be sent asap so i could wear with outfit and I would send the broken ones back but that never happened. I may need to try another company. Disappointed.
I ordered these earrings for a themed party. One of the earrings came broken. Overall the product is cute, but I would not buy them again.
Nice earrings, went well with my Chola costume. Could only wear for a few hours because they are heavy.
The earrings were bigger than the holes in my earlobes. Painful to put on and take off.
